about_the_game:
Rebel Roar is an action-packed Deckbuilder where you can strategically combine animal decks with classes, creating new rebel warriors and engaging in intense card battles against the tyrannical Sapiens.


From the stealthy Cat-Ninja to the cunning Opossum-Hacker, lead the resistance against the oppressive XSapiens corporation. Liberate your fellow animals, forge powerful alliances, and challenge the status quo in this thrilling game.

OVER 20 ANIMALS IN YOUR FIGHT

Explore 5 different families and over 20 amazing animals, each with their own unique abilities and combat tactics to redefine the battle.

UNLEASH THE POWER OF REVOLUTION

Unlock 20 classes for your brave animals, skillfully mix your cards, and execute devastating combos to defeat your enemies and change the course of history.

CUSTOMIZE AND DOMINATE

Personalize your consoles with over 200 rebellious stickers that will transform your heroes into symbols of resistance, giving you the edge you need in the fight against the XSapiens Corporation.

FACE YOUR DESTINY

Engage in epic battles where up to 3 heroes face off against 3 enemies, exploring 6 different biomes in your quest to overthrow the corrupt empire of XSapiens. The revolution has begun!

short_description: Rebel Roar is a tactical roguelike deckbuilder set in an animal cyberpunk universe. Lead a group of heroic freedom fighters, in a revolution against the evil human corporations. Combine decks by choosing your animals' classes: from the ninja cat to the hacker possum.
